column4: my laptop (ThinkPad R61) has been freezing and crashing since installing Intrepid .... :(
ACPI may be borked.  I fought for a few weeks on an R61 then work gave me a T61.....
grrrrrrr .... its very frustrating ... yesterday is froze up just when I was toward the end of a lengthy letter ....
is there any way to find out whats causeing the issue? ... like in WIndows XP its pretty easy to find out by looking at the log
